column4: hey guys, does any1 know a laptop with a great nvidia card thats great with ubuntu,wine and is power full?
hey guys, does any1 know a laptop with a great nvidia card thats great with ubuntu,wine and is power full?
oh ok i only got a bugget of like 300$
this laptop came with intel 945gm or a nvidia ...
well i got a dell d620 core due 1.8ghz with a 256 945gm chipset with 80 hd and 1gb ram
it pays to research whats out there. and fits your budget.
find a high end laptop with a good nvidia card. :) thats what i did.
it also cost me close to $1000
look for a low end nvidia system I guess...
but really for  a bit more $$ you can get a LOT nicer system. I splurged this time.. beucase i  got sick of the $300 range laptops
:) i got 2. 500GB hd's   yes. this laptop is a Back-breaker.. heh
it has enough powar to run Crysis at high settings. :)
does it run fear well on windows? wine can be slower.. but it depends on the game
